meanings.sent1: The preemergent seeds lay dormant in the soil, waiting for the right conditions to sprout.
meanings.sent2: The preemergent buds on the tree signaled the upcoming spring season.
meanings.sent3: The preemergent caterpillar stayed hidden in its cocoon, planning a surprise appearance.
meanings.sent4: The preemergent stars twinkled faintly in the dark sky, hinting at the beauty yet to come.
meanings.sent5: The preemergent ideas in her mind slowly took shape, ready to burst forth with creativity.

meanings.sent1: The preemergent herbicide effectively stopped the growth of weeds in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The preemergent treatment protected the lawn from unwanted pests.
meanings.sent3: The preemergent barrier around the garden kept the rabbits from munching on the vegetables.
meanings.sent4: The preemergent strategy in the game blocked the opponent's moves before they could even start.
meanings.sent5: The preemergent measures in place ensured a smooth and obstacle-free process.
